title: Workshop on Designing Digital-Based Blended Learning for Physical Therapists

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physical therapy theory and practical training experience
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing the enhancement of practical competencies for in-service physical therapists using digital tools.

learning_goals: Application of the flipped learning model to improve the efficiency of physical therapy theory learning by 30%.
In a blended learning environment, achievement of a score of 4 or higher (out of 5) on the evaluation scale for the ability to produce and utilize digital content (apps/videos).
Maintenance of an accuracy rate of 85% or higher in patient assessment scenarios using virtual simulation tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
